node.html: Built with React, my first portfolio helped me learn the basics of interactive web development!

Built with ASP.NET, Vidify served as my intro to secure user management (ASP.NET Identity) and database interaction (Entity Framework). It has a responsive UI for movie browsing and user rentals and admin management.
A unix shell-like program that has basic shell functionality with features like background job execution, job listing, foreground/background switching, signal handling, and logging.
Award-winning project (2 awards at Patriothacks 2019) leverages machine learning to create a application with real-time object identification and mood detection capabilities.
Implementation of Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm for weighted graphs. It visualizes the algorithm's progress by highlighting active nodes, edges, and updating distances on the graph.
